name: Thousand Seas Pavilion Pass (2 weeks)
description:
This pass provides temporary access to the Thousand Seas Pavilion, a beautiful isle adrift in the Mists.
• Quick Travel to All Cities and a Variety of Fishing Locations
• Scenic and Convenient Fishing and Boating Opportunities
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.
